version_description: Hi there, this update contains huge stability improvements.

Hi there, this update contains bug fix for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6s where users find it difficult to hit notes. Also we fix bug with subscription screen, now you finally can buy subscription. Also we make some adjustment for iPhone X users.
Good News Everyone! This update contains some bug fixes and adds iPad support.

Good news everyone!
In this update we add a lot of stuff:
– Dozens of new exercises.
– New lesson/exercise hierarchy.
– New “static” exercises where you should sing 2+ notes in a row.
– Exercise success score. You can see some fancy stars at the end of exercise now.
– The new type of lessons “Exam”. You can now unlock more complicated exercises right from the start if you are skillful enough.
– We made some tweaks to pitch recognition.
– Practice reminder. Look at settings screen if you need it.
– Bug fix. General performance improvement.
– Bug fix. Crash on iPad.
– Bug fix. Crash on iOS 9.3.5
– Bug fix. Some exercises show incorrect notes (ex. You choose “High” vocal range and still was forced to sing notes for “Low” range)

Good news everyone!
Bug fix, bug fix, bug fix and some bug fix.

Good news everyone!
We finally made new version. It contains a lot of useful stuff:
- New onboarding and program tweaks for beginners
- Cache, now you don’t need to redownload every time all lesson assets
- New Lesson view
- Program tweaks for advanced folks
- General stability improvement and bug fix

Good news everyone!
Here is quick bug fix.

Hi there, we testing new way of onboarding users. From now you can't get inside app without activating free trial or pay for subscription. If you use SingBot only for warm ups and never think about buying subscription - maybe you shoud skip this update.

Hi there, we testing new way of onboarding users. From now you can't get inside app without activating free trial or pay for subscription. If you use SingBot only for warm ups and never think about buying subscription - maybe you shoud skip this update.
Good news everyone! Now we work perfectly with wireless headphones.
Good news everyone, new stuff here, we fixed some bugs and made some under the hood tweaks
Good news everyone, hot fix for bug where you can't sometimes login in app.
Good news everyone, some under the hood tweaks and improvements here. Also we wish you happy holidays.
Good news everyone, some under the hood tweaks and improvements here. Also we wish you happy holidays.
Good news everyone, we finally fixed that crash in singing exercises that annoys so many people
Good news everyone, some improvements in singing exercise are here. Also we improve stability and fix issue where app crashes in the middle of exercise.
Good news everyone, we finally released first version of drills for better everyday practice.
Good news everyone! We change how server handle content in this update, so new exercises coming soon.
Good news everyone! New content is here, enjoy new exercises and lessons.
Good news everyone, new content update and stability improvements is here.
Good news everyone! New content update is here, also we changed how app works with AirPods, now you can sing directly to AirPods microphone.

Good news everyone!
Now it’s easier to start learning - you can explore the first lessons even without headphones.
Some minor content changes are also implemented

Good news everyone!
Some quality of life improvements is here.
Good news everyone! New feature is available now. Try to challenge yourself and sing the whole songs.

Good news everyone!
Dark mode is here, Also we add fresh content and make some stability tweaks to make your singing experience better.

Good news everyone!
Roses are red
Violets are blue
Singing is great
And so are you

Good news everyone!
We've resolved the issue when the pitch indicator stopped working and implemented several enchantments to improve your experience.

Good news everyone!
The behavior of the pitch indicator was changed to give you a better feedback about sounds you singing.
Some minor improvements should also make your learning process more pleasant.

Good news everyone!
The Learning tab view was changed to make it easy to imagine the whole path you should go while singing with the app.
Enjoy the renewed content and don’t hesitate to share your experience with us via Support link.

Good news everyone!
Spanish and Russian languages are now available in the app.
Some content updates should make learning process more enjoyable.
Tell us what do you think about it via Support email.

Good news everyone!
We’ve fixed one annoying bug with restoring of subscriptions.
Respect for our users who informed us via support email and helped to catch the problem.

Good news everyone!
We've added some tips to make it more clear what’s going on if you can't pass the exercise.
Also we’ve made loading of the lessons faster so please enjoy!

Good news everyone!
Grab one more portion of changes with this update.
Improved notes counter makes your achievement more accurate.
Faster content delivery allows you to start learning almost immediately.
Also we’ve fixed the issue with voice range selection.
We'd love to get your opinion about it via Support email.
Good news everyone! Roses are red. Violets are blue. Singing is great. And so are you
Good news everyone! Some stability tweaks.
Good news everyone! Some stability tweaks are here
